categories: Category:Star Wars: Fate of the Jedi

nodes.text: Fate of the Jedi: Allies (American Printing House for the Blind audiobook)

Fate of the Jedi: Allies is the unabridged audiobook version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, by author Christie Golden. The audiobook was performed by Alec Volz and released by American Foundation for the Blind in 2011.
